Package com.wishcan.www.vocabulazy.player.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlayerMainView.OnPlayerItemPreparedListener
    OnPlayerItemPreparedListener contains the event of Player Item states
    PlayerMainView.OnPlayerScrollListener
    OnPlayerScrollListener contains all event of PlayerMainView's child
    PlayerOptionContentView.OnOptionClickListener
    OnOptionClickListener is the callback function when any of option, including tab, is clicked
    PlayerOptionView.OnOptionChangedListener
    OnOptionChangedListener is the callback function when any of option, including tab, is changed
    PlayerPanelView.OnPanelItemClickListener
    OnPanelItemListener is the callback function when any of setting item is clicked
    PlayerView.PlayerEventListener
    PlayerEventListener contains all events of Player's child The fragment contains the Player should implement to maintain MVC structure
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PlayerMainView  
    PlayerMainView.PlayerScrollView  
    PlayerOptionContentView  
    PlayerOptionView  
    PlayerOptionView.PlayerOptionTabView
    PlayerOptionTabView is our Tab items, which is a RelativeLayout containing a PlayerOptionImageView (a trapezoid) and a TextView(the tab item's title)
    PlayerOptionView.WrapContentViewPager
    WrapContentViewPager enables ViewPager can be assigned a specific size.
    PlayerPanelView  
    PlayerView
